Author: flortotheno
Text: I seriously went without going to the bathroom for 3+ weeks, and now every day. Just put some greens (spinach for example) and a cup of water, blend those together. Then, add in a frozen banana and a fruit/s that you like (and more water if needed) Makes 2 servings, depending on the fruit they have <100 calories. The one that helps me out the most is frozen banana + frozen apple and it's like 80 cals.

Author: invincibletitan33
Text: What do you put in your green smoothies??? Am sick of being constipated.
